prefs-vectorad-enable-vectorad-1-label: Label for the checkbox to force Legacy VectorAd operation accessible via Special:Preferences. When this checkbox is enabled, the December 2019 of VectorAd is used. When this checkbox is disabled, the actively developed version of VectorAd is used instead.
prefs-vectorad-enable-vectorad-1-help: Detail explaining the operation of the prefs-vectorad-enable-vectorad-1-label checkbox.
vectorad-opt-out: Text of link that takes the user to the Special:Preferences page so they can opt-out of the latest version of VectorAd and go back to legacy VectorAd.
vectorad-opt-out-tooltip: Used as the tooltip for the VectorAd opt-out link
vectorad-action-toggle-sidebar: Accessibility label for the button that toggles the sidebar's visibility, as well as audible presentation for screen readers.
vectorad-action-addsection:
Used in the VectorAd skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=vectorad}}
{{Identical|Add topic}}
vectorad-action-delete:
Used in the VectorAd skin, as the name of a tab at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=vectorad}}

{{Identical|Delete}}
vectorad-action-move:
Used in the VectorAd skin, on the tabs at the top of the page. See for example {{canonicalurl:Talk:Main_Page|useskin=vectorad}}

{{Identical|Move}}
vectorad-action-protect:
Tab at top of page, in VectorAd skin

{{Identical|Protect}}
vectorad-action-undelete:
Tab at top of page, in VectorAd skin.
{{Identical|Undelete}}
vectorad-action-unprotect:
Tab at top of page, in VectorAd skin.
{{Identical|Change protection}}
vectorad-view-create:
Tab label in the VectorAd skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Foo|useskin=vectorad}}
{{Identical|Create}}
vectorad-view-edit:
Tab label in the VectorAd skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=vectorad}}
{{Identical|Edit}}
vectorad-view-history:
Tab label in the VectorAd skin. See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=vectorad}}
{{Identical|View history}}
vectorad-view-view:
Tab label in the VectorAd skin (verb). See for example {{canonicalurl:Translating:MediaWiki|useskin=vectorad}}.
{{Identical|Read}}
vectorad-view-viewsource:
Tab label in the VectorAd skin.
{{Identical|View source}}
vectorad-more-actions: Label in the VectorAd skin's menu for the less-important or rarer actions which are not shown as tabs (like moving the page, or for sysops deleting or protecting the page), as well as (for users with a narrow viewing window in their browser) the less-important tab actions which the user's browser is unable to fit in. {{Identical|More}}
